message: Have a look around.  I know it isn’t much, but we’ll fix it up.
Do you know what that is?
Right!  En svamp is a mushroom.
Svampar are everywhere.  In the forest, in the foxholes, and apparently even in our safehouse!
Your first mission will be to find more svampar.  What do you say?
Tack!  With more svampar, we can upgrade our safehouse.  But they’re all outside. You need to find them.
